attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stephen Hawking is an internationally renowned figure for his incredible scientific work, and also his incredible resilience in the face of grave illness. Because of this it would be an inspiring sign to see such a man knighted.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours to make a nomination.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
